SELECT m.member_id as member_id, h.write_date as write_date, h.result as result, m.name as name, m.email as email, m.tel as tel
FROM host h, member m WHERE h.host_id = m.member_id

SELECT m.member_id as member_id, m.name as name, m.email as email, m.password as password, m.tel as tel, m.join_date as join_date, m.last_conn_date as last_conn_date, m.auth as auth, h.host_pic as host_pic, h.company as company, h.uni as uni, h.auth_file as auth_file, h.host_value as host_value, h.write_date as write_date, h.content as content, h.result as result
FROM host h, member m WHERE h.host_id = m.member_id AND h.host_id = #{hostId}

SELECT C.*, M1.*, M2.NAME AS HNAME, M2.Member_ID AS HID, M2.EMAIL AS HEMAIL, M2.TEL AS HTEL FROM CONTACT C, MEMBER M1, MEMBER M2 WHERE c.guest_id = m1.member_id AND c.host_id = m2.member_id ORDER BY C.REGI_DATE DESC
